name: Contractor First Aid Kit by Medique
description: A rugged, portable OSHA-compliant kit designed for small crews up to 25 workers.
target_audience_match: Perfect for small crews trying to stay compliant without spending hours researching OSHA rules.

name: North by Honeywell First Aid Kit
description: Compact, OSHA-compliant first aid kit with industrial-grade supplies.
target_audience_match: Great for foremen who need pro-level safety gear but don’t want to lug around a bulky box.

name: MFASCO Construction First Aid Kit
description: All-in-one jobsite kit packed for fast treatment of cuts, burns, and injuries.
target_audience_match: Ideal for busy contractors who want everything in one place—ready to toss in the truck and go.

name: First Aid Only Contractor Kit (FAO-442)
description: OSHA-compliant kit designed for up to 25 employees, ideal for job trailers and trucks.
target_audience_match: Perfect for leads who want a clean, organized kit they can show an inspector without panic.

name: Surviveware Small First Aid Kit
description: Compact, water-resistant kit with labeled compartments and essentials for small teams.
target_audience_match: Made for solo operators who still want to show up prepared and professional.
